name: shadcn/ui
description: Beautifully designed components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS

components.name: accordion
components.description: Vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal content

type.description: Whether one or multiple items can be opened at once

components.usage: import { Accordion, AccordionContent, AccordionItem, AccordionTrigger } from '@/components/ui/accordion'

examples.title: Single Accordion
examples.code:
<Accordion type='single' collapsible>
  <AccordionItem value='item-1'>
    <AccordionTrigger>Is it accessible?</AccordionTrigger>
    <AccordionContent>Yes. It adheres to the WAI-ARIA design pattern.</AccordionContent>
  </AccordionItem>
</Accordion>

components.name: alert
components.description: Displays a callout for user attention
components.usage: import { Alert, AlertDescription, AlertTitle } from '@/components/ui/alert'

examples.title: Default Alert
examples.code:
<Alert>
  <AlertTitle>Heads up!</AlertTitle>
  <AlertDescription>You can add components to your app.</AlertDescription>
</Alert>

components.name: alert-dialog
components.description: Modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content
components.usage: import { AlertDialog, AlertDialogAction, AlertDialogCancel, AlertDialogContent, AlertDialogDescription, AlertDialogFooter, AlertDialogHeader, AlertDialogTitle, AlertDialogTrigger } from '@/components/ui/alert-dialog'

examples.title: Confirmation Dialog
examples.code:
<AlertDialog>
  <AlertDialogTrigger asChild>
    <Button variant='outline'>Delete Account</Button>
  </AlertDialogTrigger>
  <AlertDialogContent>
    <AlertDialogHeader>
      <AlertDialogTitle>Are you sure?</AlertDialogTitle>
      <AlertDialogDescription>This action cannot be undone.</AlertDialogDescription>
    </AlertDialogHeader>
    <AlertDialogFooter>
      <AlertDialogCancel>Cancel</AlertDialogCancel>
      <AlertDialogAction>Continue</AlertDialogAction>
    </AlertDialogFooter>
  </AlertDialogContent>
</AlertDialog>

components.name: collapsible
components.description: Interactive component which expands/collapses a panel
components.usage: import { Collapsible, CollapsibleContent, CollapsibleTrigger } from '@/components/ui/collapsible'

examples.title: Basic Collapsible
examples.code:
<Collapsible>
  <CollapsibleTrigger>Can I use this in my project?</CollapsibleTrigger>
  <CollapsibleContent>
    Yes. Free to use for personal and commercial projects.
  </CollapsibleContent>
</Collapsible>

components.name: combobox
components.description: Autocomplete input and command palette with a list of suggestions
components.note: Built using Popover and Command components
components.usage:
import { Command, CommandInput, CommandList, CommandItem } from '@/components/ui/command'
import { Popover, PopoverContent, PopoverTrigger } from '@/components/ui/popover'

examples.title: Framework Selector
examples.code:
<Popover open={open} onOpenChange={setOpen}>
  <PopoverTrigger asChild>
    <Button variant='outline' role='combobox'>
      {value || 'Select framework...'}
    </Button>
  </PopoverTrigger>
  <PopoverContent>
    <Command>
      <CommandInput placeholder='Search framework...' />
      <CommandList>
        <CommandItem onSelect={setValue}>Next.js</CommandItem>
        <CommandItem onSelect={setValue}>React</CommandItem>
      </CommandList>
    </Command>
  </PopoverContent>
</Popover>

components.name: command
components.description: Fast, composable, unstyled command menu
components.usage: import { Command, CommandInput, CommandList, CommandEmpty, CommandGroup, CommandItem } from '@/components/ui/command'

examples.title: Command Menu
examples.code:
<Command>
  <CommandInput placeholder='Type a command or search...' />
  <CommandList>
    <CommandEmpty>No results found.</CommandEmpty>
    <CommandGroup heading='Suggestions'>
      <CommandItem>Calendar</CommandItem>
      <CommandItem>Search Emoji</CommandItem>
    </CommandGroup>
  </CommandList>
</Command>

components.name: dialog

components.usage: import { Dialog, DialogContent, DialogDescription, DialogHeader, DialogTitle, DialogTrigger } from '@/components/ui/dialog'

examples.title: Basic Dialog
examples.code:
<Dialog>

    <Button>Open Dialog</Button>
  </DialogTrigger>
  <DialogContent>
    <DialogHeader>
      <DialogTitle>Are you sure?</DialogTitle>
      <DialogDescription>This action cannot be undone.</DialogDescription>
    </DialogHeader>

</Dialog>

components.name: drawer
components.description: Side panel that slides in from the edge of the screen
components.usage: import { Drawer, DrawerClose, DrawerContent, DrawerDescription, DrawerFooter, DrawerHeader, DrawerTitle, DrawerTrigger } from '@/components/ui/drawer'

examples.title: Bottom Drawer
examples.code:
<Drawer>
  <DrawerTrigger asChild>
    <Button>Open Drawer</Button>
  </DrawerTrigger>
  <DrawerContent>
    <DrawerHeader>
      <DrawerTitle>Drawer Title</DrawerTitle>
      <DrawerDescription>Drawer description</DrawerDescription>
    </DrawerHeader>
    <DrawerFooter>
      <Button>Submit</Button>
      <DrawerClose asChild>
        <Button variant='outline'>Cancel</Button>
      </DrawerClose>
    </DrawerFooter>
  </DrawerContent>
</Drawer>

components.name: dropdown-menu
components.description: Displays a menu to the user triggered by a button
components.usage: import { DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuLabel, DropdownMenuSeparator, DropdownMenuTrigger } from '@/components/ui/dropdown-menu'

components.name: form
components.description: Building forms with React Hook Form and Zod validation
components.usage: import { Form, FormControl, FormDescription, FormField, FormItem, FormLabel, FormMessage } from '@/components/ui/form'

examples.title: Form with Validation
examples.code:
const form = useForm({
  resolver: zodResolver(formSchema)
})

<Form {...form}>
  <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit(onSubmit)}>
    <FormField
      control={form.control}
      name='username'
      render={({ field }) => (
        <FormItem>
          <FormLabel>Username</FormLabel>
          <FormControl>
            <Input placeholder='shadcn' {...field} />
          </FormControl>
          <FormMessage />
        </FormItem>
      )}
    />
    <Button type='submit'>Submit</Button>
  </form>
</Form>

components.name: hover-card
components.description: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link
components.usage: import { HoverCard, HoverCardContent, HoverCardTrigger } from '@/components/ui/hover-card'

examples.title: Profile Hover Card

VC

@nextjs

The React Framework

components.name: input-otp
components.description: Accessible one-time password component with copy paste functionality
components.usage: import { InputOTP, InputOTPGroup, InputOTPSeparator, InputOTPSlot } from '@/components/ui/input-otp'

examples.title: 6-Digit OTP
examples.code:
<InputOTP maxLength={6}>
  <InputOTPGroup>
    <InputOTPSlot index={0} />
    <InputOTPSlot index={1} />
    <InputOTPSlot index={2} />
  </InputOTPGroup>
  <InputOTPSeparator />
  <InputOTPGroup>
    <InputOTPSlot index={3} />
    <InputOTPSlot index={4} />
    <InputOTPSlot index={5} />
  </InputOTPGroup>
</InputOTP>

components.name: pagination
components.description: Pagination with page navigation, next and previous links
components.usage: import { Pagination, PaginationContent, PaginationEllipsis, PaginationItem, PaginationLink, PaginationNext, PaginationPrevious } from '@/components/ui/pagination'

examples.title: Basic Pagination
examples.code:
<Pagination>
  <PaginationContent>
    <PaginationItem>
      <PaginationPrevious href='#' />
    </PaginationItem>
    <PaginationItem>
      <PaginationLink href='#'>1</PaginationLink>
    </PaginationItem>
    <PaginationItem>
      <PaginationLink href='#' isActive>2</PaginationLink>
    </PaginationItem>
    <PaginationItem>
      <PaginationLink href='#'>3</PaginationLink>
    </PaginationItem>
    <PaginationItem>
      <PaginationEllipsis />
    </PaginationItem>
    <PaginationItem>
      <PaginationNext href='#' />
    </PaginationItem>
  </PaginationContent>
</Pagination>

components.name: select

    <SelectItem value='orange'>Orange</SelectItem>

</Select>

components.name: toggle
components.description: A two-state button that can be either on or off
components.usage: import { Toggle } from '@/components/ui/toggle'

components.name: toggle-group
components.description: A set of two-state buttons that can be toggled on or off

type.description: Whether only one or multiple items can be pressed at a time

value.description: Controlled value (string for single, string[] for multiple)

spacing.description: Gap between toggle items (in spacing units)

components.usage: import { ToggleGroup, ToggleGroupItem } from '@/components/ui/toggle-group'

examples.title: Single Selection
examples.code:
<ToggleGroup type='single'>
  <ToggleGroupItem value='left' aria-label='Align left'>
    <AlignLeft className='h-4 w-4' />
  </ToggleGroupItem>
  <ToggleGroupItem value='center' aria-label='Align center'>
    <AlignCenter className='h-4 w-4' />
  </ToggleGroupItem>
  <ToggleGroupItem value='right' aria-label='Align right'>
    <AlignRight className='h-4 w-4' />
  </ToggleGroupItem>
</ToggleGroup>

examples.title: Multiple Selection
examples.code:
<ToggleGroup type='multiple'>
  <ToggleGroupItem value='bold' aria-label='Toggle bold'>
    <Bold className='h-4 w-4' />
  </ToggleGroupItem>
  <ToggleGroupItem value='italic' aria-label='Toggle italic'>
    <Italic className='h-4 w-4' />
  </ToggleGroupItem>
  <ToggleGroupItem value='underline' aria-label='Toggle underline'>
    <Underline className='h-4 w-4' />
  </ToggleGroupItem>
</ToggleGroup>

examples.title: With Spacing and Custom Styles
examples.code:
import { BookmarkIcon, HeartIcon, StarIcon } from 'lucide-react'

<ToggleGroup type='multiple' variant='outline' spacing={2} size='sm'>
  <ToggleGroupItem
    value='star'
    aria-label='Toggle star'
    className='data-[state=on]:bg-transparent data-[state=on]:*:[svg]:fill-yellow-500 data-[state=on]:*:[svg]:stroke-yellow-500'
  >
    <StarIcon />
    Star
  </ToggleGroupItem>
  <ToggleGroupItem
    value='heart'
    aria-label='Toggle heart'
    className='data-[state=on]:bg-transparent data-[state=on]:*:[svg]:fill-red-500 data-[state=on]:*:[svg]:stroke-red-500'
  >
    <HeartIcon />
    Heart
  </ToggleGroupItem>
  <ToggleGroupItem
    value='bookmark'
    aria-label='Toggle bookmark'
    className='data-[state=on]:bg-transparent data-[state=on]:*:[svg]:fill-blue-500 data-[state=on]:*:[svg]:stroke-blue-500'
  >
    <BookmarkIcon />
    Bookmark
  </ToggleGroupItem>
</ToggleGroup>

components.name: tooltip
components.description: Popup that displays information related to an element when the element receives keyboard focus or the mouse hovers over it
components.usage: import { Tooltip, TooltipContent, TooltipProvider, TooltipTrigger } from '@/components/ui/tooltip'
